item.title: How to Publish a Bash Script to Homebrew
item.description: Homebrew is a popular package manager for macOS (and Linux) that allows you to distribute scripts and tools easily. In this guide, we’ll walk through how to publish a bash script to Homebrew so that others can install it via brew install. 1.
